item.title: First
item.description: Content Hello Internet What I have done What will happen in the future Hello Internet So It’s time for me to get a blog. Heads up, I like to explain how I think when I write, so some parts might be a bit drawn out. But hopefully this place might be useful for you as well. I will mostly use this blog to write about IT but it’s possible I will mention something about running or any of my other interests.
